list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add real-time synchronization for total emissions with Firebase
- Implemented a real-time listener using `addValueEventListener` to ensure local variable `totalEmissions` stays synchronized with Firebase's `AnnualEmission` data. - Updated `fetchTotalEmissions` to compare local data with Firebase and update the local variable and UI when a mismatch is detected. - Modified `onCreate` to initialize the real-time listener immediately after activity creation. - Improved error handling for null or missing data in Firebase. - Prevented overwriting of local variable when Firebase data is unavailable or invalid.
This update ensures consistent synchronization between the local variable and Firebase data, resolving discrepancies and improving data integrity during purchases.

task.summary:
Implement HomePageActivity, CompleteRegistrationActivity, and Initialize EcoGuageActivity
- Implemented `HomePageActivity`, including a button to navigate to `EcoGuageActivity` with proper layout adjustments. - Finalized `CompleteRegistrationActivity`, completing the user registration flow and ensuring smooth navigation. - Initialized `EcoGuageActivity` as the destination for emissions tracking, setting up the UI for future data visualizations. - Established basic navigation flow between `HomePageActivity` and `EcoGuageActivity`, and ensured that registration completion properly redirects users to the next screen.

Add EcoBalanceActivity to enable carbon offset purchases
- Implemented EcoBalanceActivity as a new AppCompatActivity to help users offset their carbon emissions. - Added project browsing functionality with dynamic details (description, location, impact, cost). - Integrated real-time cost calculation based on CO2e offset quantity. - Included a confirmation dialog for offset purchases to improve user experience. - Used AutoCompleteTextView for project selection and dynamically displayed project details.
This feature provides a holistic solution for users to reduce their overall carbon footprint.

Add real-time synchronization for total emissions with Firebase
- Implemented a real-time listener using `addValueEventListener` to ensure local variable `totalEmissions` stays synchronized with Firebase's `AnnualEmission` data. - Updated `fetchTotalEmissions` to compare local data with Firebase and update the local variable and UI when a mismatch is detected. - Modified `onCreate` to initialize the real-time listener immediately after activity creation. - Improved error handling for null or missing data in Firebase. - Prevented overwriting of local variable when Firebase data is unavailable or invalid.
This update ensures consistent synchronization between the local variable and Firebase data, resolving discrepancies and improving data integrity during purchases.

This update ensures consistent synchronization between the local variable and Firebase data, resolving discrepancies and improving data integrity during purchases.

This feature provides a holistic solution for users to reduce their overall carbon footprint.

This update ensures consistent synchronization between the local variable and Firebase data, resolving discrepancies and improving data integrity during purchases.
